description:
Yuko didn`t have horns or a tail when she went to bed last night! Now her mom`s revealing the deep dark secret their family`s been hiding for generations — What`s going on!?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Yuko Awakens!! For Family Reasons You`re Now a Demon Girl
Yuuko no Mezame!! Katei no Jijou de Kyou kara Mazoku
優子の目覚め!! 家庭の事情で今日から魔族
유코의 각성!! 가정 사정으로 오늘부터 마족
